00034 void SumCF::add(CovarianceFunction& cf)
00035 {
00036         covFunctions.push_back(&cf);
00037         numberParameters += cf.getNumberParameters();
00038 }

00048 inline double SumCF::computeElement(const vec& A, const vec& B) const
00049 {
00050         double k = 0.0;
00051 
00052         for(std::vector<CovarianceFunction *>::size_type i = 0; i < covFunctions.size(); i++)
00053         {
00054                 k = k + covFunctions[i]->computeElement(A, B);
00055         }
00056 
00057         return k;
00058 }

00067 inline double SumCF::computeDiagonalElement(const vec& A) const
00068 {
00069         double k = 0.0;
00070 
00071         for(std::vector<CovarianceFunction *>::size_type i = 0; i < covFunctions.size(); i++)
00072         {
00073                 k = k + covFunctions[i]->computeDiagonalElement(A);
00074         }
00075 
00076         return k;
00077 }

00087 void SumCF::displayCovarianceParameters(int nspaces) const
00088 {
00089         string space(nspaces, ' ');
00090         
00091     cout << space << "Covariance function : Sum" << endl;
00092         for(std::vector<CovarianceFunction *>::size_type i = 0; i < covFunctions.size(); i++)
00093         {
00094                 cout << space << "+ Component: " << (i+1) << endl;
00095                 covFunctions[i]->displayCovarianceParameters(nspaces+2);
00096         }
00097 }

00109 void SumCF::covarianceGradient(mat& D, const int p, const mat& X) const
00110 {
00111     int cfIndex;
00112     int parcfIndex;
00113 
00114     reindex(cfIndex, parcfIndex, p);
00115     covFunctions[cfIndex]->covarianceGradient(D, parcfIndex, X);

00159 void SumCF::setTransformedParameters(const vec pvec)
00160 {
00161         int parFrom = 0;
00162         int parTo = 0;
00163         vector<CovarianceFunction*>::iterator cf;
00164 
00165         // Extract the transformed parameters for each covariance and
00166         // assign them
00167         for (cf = covFunctions.begin(); cf != covFunctions.end(); cf++)
00168         {
00169             parFrom = parTo;
00170             parTo += (*cf)->getNumberParameters();
00171             (*cf)->setTransformedParameters( pvec(parFrom, parTo-1) );
00172         }
00173 }
00174 
00175 
00182 vec SumCF::getTransformedParameters()
00183 {
00184         vec transPar;
00185         vector<CovarianceFunction*>::iterator cf;
00186 
00187         // Append the transformed parameters from each covariance function
00188         for (cf = covFunctions.begin(); cf != covFunctions.end(); cf++)
00189         {
00190                 transPar = concat(transPar, (*cf)->getTransformedParameters());
00191         }
00192 
00193         return transPar;
00194 }

00269 void SumCF::reindex(int& cfIndex, int& parcfIndex, int parIndex) const
00270 {
00271     assert(parIndex >= 0 && parIndex < getNumberParameters());
00272 
00273     int p = parIndex;
00274     int i = 0;
00275     int npar = covFunctions[i++]->getNumberParameters();
00276 
00277     while ( p >=  npar )
00278     {
00279         p -= npar;
00280         npar = covFunctions[i++]->getNumberParameters();
00281     }
00282 
00283     // Index of covariance function
00284     cfIndex = i-1;
00285 
00286     // Index of parameter in covariance function
00287     parcfIndex = p;
00288 }
